name: Downgrade!
description:
Downgrade!

A Platformer where you have to drop your character's abilities in order to progress.

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam, week 180.

Jam's theme: Downgrade

Credits:

  • Ansimuz - Sunny Land sprites asset
  • Synty Studios - Simple FX - Cartoon Particles
  • Dusty Room - Free Casual Game SFX Pack
  • Delta Breaker - On My Way [8 Bit Loop]
  • Beam Theory  - BIT SPACE (FTL Inspired) [LOOP]
  • TAD - 8 bit lofi - Ice Cave
